name: Headache Killer
author: John Boucha

sections.description:
Internet Explorer has long been the bane of web developers and users alike for far too long. It’s high time to kill off the software once and for all!

Take responsibility into your own hands by installing this plugin and restricting Internet Explorer from displaying your site’s content. When a web surfer hits any page on your WordPress site with Internet Explorer, they are redirected to an appropriately colored static page with an error message urging them to install a more modern web browser. A link to Chrome is provided.

  • Simple installation
  • Effective results
  • Brighten a programmer’s day
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Re-save your Permalinks
sections.faq:
Where do I go to file a bug or ask a question?

Please visit the WordPress support forums for questions or comments: https://wordpress.org/tags/headache-killer/

Can you include an option to block Microsoft Edge?

No.

Who can we send donations to?

Donations are not welcome.

short_description: Remove site access from Internet Explorer users and offer them a link to download Chrome.
